attributes.action: Make public to each and every person, Full and Transparent, all costings, to date, that the European Community has cost
attributes.additional_details: To make Public Full and Transparent costings  that the European Community in total has cost to date with a Full and Transparent Audit of Accounts. What has been spent and where. This to be made available on line and upon written request and to be made available on a yearly basis thereon
